node.name: Pivotal Tracker Mylyn Connector
node.shortdescription:
NOTE: Update site URL for Juno is http://ptmylyn.teamunify.com/juno for now.

This is a Mylyn Connector for Pivotal Tracker. It allows one to work with pivotal tracker via Eclipse, and features the following functionality:

- Story editing in eclipse
- Story Reordering
- Tasks within a story
- Context attach/retrieve
- SVN branch/switch based on story ID (optional feature). Requires subclipse.

This project is managed at:

https://www.pivotaltracker.com/projects/201525
node.body:
NOTE: Update site URL for Juno is http://ptmylyn.teamunify.com/juno for now.

This is a Mylyn Connector for Pivotal Tracker. It allows one to work with pivotal tracker via Eclipse, and features the following functionality:

- Story editing in eclipse
- Story Reordering
- Tasks within a story
- Context attach/retrieve
- SVN branch/switch based on story ID (optional feature). Requires subclipse.

This project is managed at:

https://www.pivotaltracker.com/projects/201525
